Sat., Oct. 13: Annual meeting to vote for chapter board members!
  


Milwaukee Chapter Annual Meeting

Saturday, October 13, 1-2 p.m.
Centennial Hall
733 N 8th St.
Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53233

RSVP On Facebook
Share this:           

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Join the Milwaukee Chapter of the ACLU of Wisconsin on Saturday, October 13 to vote for chapter board members, learn about becoming an ACLU member, and to learn more about the ACLU's Smart Justice Campaign during the Justice Tour event immediately following this meeting!

If you can't make it to the meeting but still want to vote for chapter board members (or you prefer to vote early), you will be able to vote online starting in early October.

If you prefer to vote for board members via mail-in ballot, you must request a paper ballot from Molly Gena at molgena@gmail.com by Friday, October 6 . You may also RSVP directly to Molly if you do not have a Facebook account.

At the Justice Tour, we will explain the ACLU of Wisconsin's stop-and-frisk settlement agreement with the City of Milwaukee. There will also be a panel discussion about ACLU's Smart Justice Campaign, a statewide plan to decrease incarceration in Wisconsin.

We hope to see you on Saturday, October 13!

Sincerely,

The Milwaukee Chapter Board
ACLU of Wisconsin
